page.title: 01Breachwood G. Village Hall
page.content: Breachwood Green Village Hall was built in 1969.There were lots of Societies in the village which needed somewhere to meet so a group of people joined together to raise money to build the hall. Brownies meet in the village hall every Wednesday night.The Brownies group started in 1982 and now there are 24 Brownies. Cubs meet in the village hall every Tuesday at six p.m.Cubs,in Breachwood Green,started in September 1981.There are three leaders.Their names are Akela,Bagheera and Baloo.Today there are 21 Cubs.There are three sixes red, blue and yellow.Iam 8 years old and in red six. Breachwood Green Playgroup meets in the village hall on 3 mornings every week.It began in January 1978 it was started by 6 mums with small children.
